wjhk.jupload
Class JUploadPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  wjhk.jupload.JUploadPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class JUploadPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

Main code for the applet (or frame) creation. It contains all creation for necessary elements, or calls to UploadPolicy to allow easy personalization.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

JUploadPanel

public JUploadPanel(java.applet.Applet applet)
Constuctor to call, when running in standard way : as an applet.

JUploadPanel

public JUploadPanel(java.awt.Container container,
                    UploadPolicy uploadPolicy)
Constructor to call, when running from outside of an applet : this is taken from the version 1 of Jupload. It can be used for test (like originally), but this is now useless as eclipse allow direct execution of applet, for tests. It can also be used to use this code from within a java application.

Parameters:
container - The container, where all GUI elements are to be created.
uploadPolicy - The current UploadPolicy. Null if a new one must be created.
See Also:
UploadPolicyFactory.getUploadPolicy(Applet, JTextArea)
Method Detail

init

private void init(java.applet.Applet applet,
                  java.awt.Container container,
                  UploadPolicy uploadPolicyParam)
Initialization code : called by all constructors.

Parameters:
applet - The current applet. Null if not called from an applet.
container - The current container. Contains the same value as 'applet', if called from an applet.
uploadPolicyParam - The current UploadPolicy. Null if a new one must be created.
